column4: anyone knows what to do when grub doesnt respond to any keyboard input and doesnt boot into linux? (its not a dual boot)
usb keyboards do that sometime, ps2 will work
its stuck like that almost 20 minutes]
any errors on terminal 8?  (ctrl+alt+f8) (alt+f7  to get back to X)
it doesnt respond to keyboard
ahh, yeah, sorry :(
is it a usb keyboard? And did it work before?
it worked till yesterday , its not usb
that is odd. Is this the first time it has happened?
yes
My clean install of Hardy needed a forced reboot the first time. I'd give that a try
rebooted several times....its indeed strange. i installee a month ago
but I thought you just said it was the first time it happened?
i installed a month ago , it was working till yesterday, today i turn the computer on and its stuck in grub,already 30 minutes, rebooted still stuck
i'm writing from a different computer (gutsy ftw)
I'd fsck your drive and reinstall grub
with a live CD?
yep
sounds like it got corrupted to me (just a hunch though)
got this:  http://ubuntuforums.org/showthread.php?t=462100
via:  grub doesn't respond to keyboard
but that is the USB issue I mentioned at the start I guess
linux_manju thanks for the help. live CD it is
you're welcome. Check that drive for errors :)
